bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.blast.core

Class AnalysisUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.blast.core.AnalysisUtils

  • public class AnalysisUtils
extends Object
    Set of utility methods for the BLASTViewer tool.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

    • Method Detail

      • getCoordMappedToQuery

        public static int getCoordMappedToQuery(SRHsp hsp,
                        int hitLocation)
        Given a location in the hit sequence coordinate system, return the corresponding location in the query coordinate system. Mapping is possible since hit and query sequences are aligned. May return -1 if mapping fails.
        Parameters:
        hsp - an HSP
        hitLocation - a location

      • computePolygone

        public static void computePolygone(int[] xPoints,
                   int[] yPoints,
                   int x1,
                   int y1,
                   int x2,
                   int yDecal,
                   boolean plusStrand)
        Compute an arrow that can be used to draw features. It is very important to note that arrays must contain 5 cells.

      • isNormalStrand

        public static boolean isNormalStrand(int from,
                     int to,
                     int frame,
                     int bType)
        Return strand type given sequence range and BLAST type.

      • getGapContent

        public static int getGapContent(DSequence seq,
                int from,
                int to)
        Return the number of gap symbols contained in a particular region of a sequence.

      • hasFeatures

        public static boolean hasFeatures(SRHsp hsp)
        Figure out whether a SRHsp contains some features.

      • hasFeatures

        public static boolean hasFeatures(SRHit hit)
        Figure out whether a SRHit contains some features. This method looks at the SRHsp contained in the SRHit and, if at least one of them contains some features, the method returns true.

      • hasWarnFeatures

        public static boolean hasWarnFeatures(SRHsp hsp)
        Check if a SRHsp contains a FeatureTable with an error status. Returns false if no FeatureTable is found.

      • hasWarnFeatures

        public static boolean hasWarnFeatures(SRHit hit)
        Check if a SRHit contains a least one SRHsp having a FeatureTable with an error status. Returns false if no FeatureTable is found.

      • computeCoverage

        public static double computeCoverage(BlastHitHSP bhh)
        Compute the coverage of a particular Hit. Returned value is in the range 0 to 100 percent.

      • prepareDataModel

        public static BlastHitHSP[] prepareDataModel(BlastIteration iter)
        Create the table data model. Since the content of this viewer relies on the BlastNavigator Viewer, this data table model is created from a BlastIteration.
